channel.title: [req]
channel.description:
Does anyone have any good documentation on how the rsc packets/protocol works ?
I understand they are encrypted, can this encryption be removed and normal integers/strings be sent through client-server vice versa? , or is it done like that for efficiency ?

item.title: [req]
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

encryption has very little to do with format

Read full topic
